description: This module gives an introduction to solid dosage forms including tablets, capsules, powders and granules, as well as topical products and transdermal delivery. Formulations of emerging importance including biologics, polymers and biomaterials will be discussed. Fundamental knowledge of product quality and stability will be covered.
title: Principles of Pharmaceutical Formulations II
prerequisite: PHS1114 Principles of Pharmaceutical Formulations I
